tag.name: @webwork.action
tag.doc: Define an action for this class

attribute.name: success
attribute.doc: Use the specified resource if SUCCESS is returned

attribute.name: error
attribute.doc: Use the specified resource if ERROR is returned

attribute.name: input
attribute.doc: Use the specified resource if INPUT is returned

attribute.name: views
attribute.doc: Provide a comma-separated list of actions views in the RETURN_VALUE=RESOURCE format used by views.properties

tag.name: @webwork.command
tag.doc: Define a CommandDriven action using this method. Your action must fulfill the CommandDriven requirements (like implementing CommandDriven.) See http://wiki.opensymphony.com/space/Using+CommandDriven+Actions

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: Command action name. Will create an action named 'action.command', where 'action' is the contents of the 'name' parameter in @webwork.action and 'command' is the contents of the 'name' parameter of this tag.

attribute.name: success
attribute.doc: Use the specified resource if SUCCESS is returned by this CommandDriven action

attribute.name: error
attribute.doc: Use the specified resource if ERROR is returned by this CommandDriven action

attribute.name: input
attribute.doc: Use the specified resource if INPUT is returned by this CommandDriven action

attribute.name: views
attribute.doc: Provide a comma-separated list of actions views in the RETURN_VALUE=RESOURCE format used by views.properties to specify additional properties for this CommandDriven action
